actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-754.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 387 - 0 (Record Vote No: 364).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6156) to clarify the jurisdiction of the Securities and Exchange Commission and the definition of security, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6156 (Securities and Exchange Commission jurisdiction).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6156) to clarify the jurisdiction of the Securities and Exchange Commission and the definition of security, and for other purposes.
